song.title: Intro
song.lyrics:
Intro Lyrics[Skit: Judge & 2 Pistols]
Ladies and gentlemen, we are here regarding case number zero-five, CF zero-zero-nine-five-two, The State of Florida v. Jeremy Saunders, A.K.A. 2 Pistols
Mr. Saunders on a previous date pled guilty to conspiracy to distribute three kilos of cocaine
Mr. Saunders, do you have anything to say prior to sentence?
Nah, nothin' at all, nothin' at all
Mr. Saunders, after viewing all the evidence in this matter, listening to thе confidential informants that you refer to as "friеnds"
And the eyewitness testimony from the Hillsboro County Sheriff's Department, it is my decision to remand you to the Custody of Corrections for fifteen years
Fifteen years, what?
—Although, Mr. Saunders, because of your proven dedication to the music industry, against my better judgement
I'm gonna suspend your sentence, and place you on probation for five years with one year's house arrest
I can assure you, Mr. Saunders, if I see you again, you'll spend every day of that fifteen years as a guest in the state of Florida
Young boss of the city, nigga
Soon to be the nationEmbed

song.title: Death Before Dishonor
song.lyrics:
Death Before Dishonor Lyrics[Intro]
2 Pistols, haha, yeah (Mr. Murder City to you, bitch)
J.U.S.T.I.C.E. League (Uh-huh, uh-huh)
BMU (Haha, oh yeah)
Y'all already what this is, nigga (It's too easy)
Death Before Dishonor, muh'fucker
I don't wanna hear shit y'all niggas talkin' (Nothin')
Haha, unless it's 'bout some money

[Chorus]
To every real nigga in the game, put your hand on your heart
Make a pledge to the streets, you will never ever talk, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
Fuck a jury and the judge, I put that on my life
I'll never take a stand, even if I'm facin' life, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
[Verse]
You see these pussy ass niggas got the game twisted
Tryna justify this thing they call dry snitchin'
Listen, real niggas stay silent
But these Kanye West ass niggas speakin' through the wire
Fire, that boy hot, don't sell him nothin'
He want a ounce now, half a bird later
Them people comin' with them indictment papers
When I was a jittybug, they call 'em now or laters, yeah
All money ain't good, better know that
When I was 7, alphabet boys and they spat
BRRAT is what I got for you cheese eaters
Rat niggas that be fuckin' with them fed people
That nigga got loose vowels at the mouth
Solid niggas know the niggas that I'm talkin' 'bout
Yeah, it's Blood Money in this muh'fucker
No need to ask your questions, 'cause I ain't sayin' nothin'

[Chorus]
To every real nigga in the game, put your hand on your heart
Make a pledge to the streets, you will never ever talk, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
Fuck a jury and the judge, I put that on my life
I'll never take a stand, even if I'm facin' life, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
Death before dishonor, nigga, death before dishonor, nigga
You might also like[Outro]
Welcome to the album, haha
YeahEmbed

song.lyrics:

(Ooh-ooh) Yeah, 2 Pistols (Ooh-ooh)
Ray J, J.U.S.T.I.C.E. League, haha (Ooh-ooh)
Somethin' serious (Yeah, ooh-ooh)
Shawty, you know what it is, come on

[Chorus: Ray J & 2 Pistols]
I know you, shawty, you know me
And you know I can't leave these streets (I can't leave)
Hustlin' is in my veins, shawty, wish I could stay
But for now, just pray for me (Pray for a nigga)
I know you, shawty, you know me
So hard for me to leave these blocks (Can't go)
Got my head tied in a knot, always runnin' from the cops
Prayin' that I don't get knocked

You just keep that pussy tight, I'm comin' home early
I gotta get it, get it (Get it), I can't leave the streets (No)
I ain't choose the hustle (Yeah), the hustle chose me (Chose me)

And you know I can't leave these streets (I can't leave)

Girl, my heart is always with you, don't get confused (No, baby)
Just hold me down, I promise that we'll make it through

They wanna throw away the key and lock a nigga up (Oh yeah)
I remember when they put me in handcuffs
I looked you in the eye, "Shawty, what you cryin' for?"
I'll be out in the mornin', baby, post bail
Get your hair done 'cause I'm comin' straight over there (There)
I trust her with the money (Money), shawty so real (Real)
I put them diamonds on her (Yeah), just to show I care
You stuck with a nigga (Nigga), in and out of jail
I know you love me, baby, I put you through hell
I gotta get it, get it (Get it), I can't leave the streets (No)
I ain't choose the hustle (No), the hustle chose me (Chose me)
[Chorus: Ray J & 2 Pistols]
I know you, shawty, you know me
And you know I can't leave these streets (I can't leave)
Hustlin' is in my veins, shawty, wish I could stay
But for now, just pray for me (Pray for a nigga)
I know you shawty, you know me
So hard for me to leave these blocks (Can't go)
Got my head tied in a knot, always runnin' from the cops
Prayin' that I don't get knocked

(Ooh-ooh) You know I push it to the limit, sunup, sundown (Ooh-ooh)
Baby, I gotta get it (Gotta get it), I gotta get it (Ooh-ooh)
You know I push it to the limit, sunup, sundown (Ooh-ooh)
Baby, I gotta get it (Gotta get it), I gotta get it (Yeah, yeah)

[Chorus: Ray J]
I know you, shawty, you know me
And you know I can't leave these streets
Hustlin' is in my veins, shawty, wish I could stay
But for now, just pray for me
I know you, shawty, you know me
So hard for me to leave these blocks

song.full_title: We Run It by 2 Pistols (Ft. Blood Raw & Slick Pulla)

song.lyrics:

Yeah, the ice look cold, but the boy so hot (2 Pistols)
We pop bottles, and get money (See what it is? I'ma do my damn thizzy)

We pop bottles, and get money (BMU)

I know, yeah, I'm so crazy

With somethin' hot in a cutlass, sittin' real big (Big)

I'ma teach you how to stunt, yellow stones in my watch
Yeah, the ice look cold, but the boy so hot
We pop bottles, and get money

(Girl, ain't that Blood Raw?) When I ride by (Hurry)

The realest nigga breathin', and you could put that on my mother (Ah man)
I been had money (Money), yeah, I'm through with the cases
I got these pussy niggas mad, I could see it on they faces (Hahaha)
I don't give a fuck (No), bitch, I'm the man (Man)
I put the state on my back in my fuckin' Louis bag (Louis)
A real street nigga not like these fuckin' fakers
They ain't wanna let us in 'cause they some motherfuckin' haters
The realest shit I'm gon' say (Say) don't nann bitch breathe (Nah)
I got two big pistols, and bitch, I squeeze (Ah man, swear to god)

Yeah, the ice look cold, but the boy so hot

We pop bottles, and get money

song.title: That’s My Word (Intro)
song.lyrics:
That’s My Word (Intro) Lyrics[Snippet of T-Pain from "She Got It"]
Hey
I know she got it 'cause she lookin' at—

[Skit: Sara Roman, Corey "Prime" Harrison & 2 Pistols]
Hello?
What's ha'nin'? How come you ain't been pickin' up the phone?
What you mean why I haven't been pickin' up the phone?
Girl, I've been tryna get ahold of you all day
I'm at work, yo, why is you trippin'?
I can't 'lax, you got time
Yo, why is you trippin'?
Oh, I'm trippin'?
Yeah, you trippin', man, you always trippin', you stay callin' me with that bullshit, yo
Oh nah, hell nah, you need to—
Yo, man, hol' on, hol' on, it's the other line
Hello?
Yeah, what's up? This Pistols, baby
Yeah, I'm just on the other line with this nigga, man
Man, what's goin' on? You sound aggravated or somethin'
Nah, he just give me a hard time like always
I told you, man, you leave that nigga alone, man, nigga ain't no good, straight upEmbed

song.full_title: That's My Word by 2 Pistols (Ft. Trey Songz)

song.lyrics:
That’s My Word Lyrics[Chorus: Trey Songz]
Don't let his wrist game fool ya
You the deal, be my ghetto princess
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word

Gon' kick him to the curb
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word

So much stress off ya shoulders
We ain't gotta fuck, I just wanna hold ya
(So close) Let you know that I'm here for you
Stop cryin', I don't wanna see no tears from you

You the deal, be my ghetto princess
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word
And if your man can't please you, ain't real
Gon' kick him to the curb
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word

Move on, let's go do us
I'm thinkin' 'bout the car seat in the Rover truck
Nah, I don't wanna rest nothin'

I keep it one hunnid, I'm the realest for ya

You the deal, be my ghetto princess
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word
And if your man can't please you, ain't real
Gon' kick him to the curb
Need to leave him right where you found him

Cop rings, quote vows tonight (Oh yeah)
Brand new life (Life), sky blue ice (Ice)

What I gotta do to make you my girl?
Take you to the hood, show you my world
Yeah, I'm on my grown man (Grown man), out in public, hold hands
Don't you feel better now that you took a chance?
Two seat equip, big body full equipped
Hair blowin' in the wind, shawty, you straight with me

[Chorus: Trey Songz]
Don't let his wrist game fool ya (Yeah, yeah)
You the deal, be my ghetto princess (Yeah, yeah)
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word (Yay)
And if your man can't please you, ain't real
Gon' kick him to the curb
Need to leave him right where you found him (Where you found him, oh)

You the deal, be my ghetto princess
Need to leave him right where you found him (Found him)
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word (You gon' be straight without him, oh)

Gon' kick him to the curb
Need to leave him right where you found him
Shawty, you gon' be straight without him, that's my word (Oh)
[Outro: Trey Songz, 2 Pistols & Both]
(Yeah) Songz and 2P, baby
(Yeah) For sure
Don't know why you let lames in the game know, ya heard me?
(Yeah) Geah, you straight shawty
Ayy, ayy, ayy (That's my word, yeah)

You the deal, be my ghetto princess
Need to leave him right where you found him

song.title: Robbery
song.lyrics:
Robbery Lyrics[Intro]
Geah
Young boss of the city, nigga
I ain't gon' bullshit, keep the bow with you, nigga
On some G shit, every nigga out here in the streets that be on the grind
That be gettin' some real muh'fuckin' money done been through some shit like this
They be frontin' or flossin' like they ain't been through it with a nigga, but
I'ma be a man 'bout mine, this exactly how it went down
They tried to rob me, them niggas tried to rob me

[Verse 1]
It was 'bout 11:30, heard a knock on my door (Yeah)
Good thing I just offed the blow (Yeah)
Looked out the peephole (Shit), my P-O?
Seen the chico (Fuck)
Must bе one of papi's people tryna drop off somеthin'
You know I got them quarter kis runnin' like water (Oh yeah), so I
Open the door up, "Pussy niggas, shop closed" (Fuck)
Took a blade to the ribcage, now I'm on the floor (Ah)
Goons runnin' all through my shit
Screamin', "Where's the bricks, fuck nigga, yeah, you know what this is"
"What (Haha), a so-called robbery?
You got a couple dollars in a Gucci wallet, bitch!"
[Chorus]
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Black gloves, black mask with the flashlight
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
They tried to rob me, them niggas tried to rob me

[Interlude]
Nah, we ain't tryna do shit, check me out, dog
Lay the fuck down, where the guns at?
I don't got none, my nigga
You been sellin' dope out this motherfucker, don't look look crazy now, pussy nigga
Ah, my nigga
Uh, know I'm sayin'? Pussy nigga, now ya leakin', yeah
Nigga, that—nigga, that shit was weak, nigga
Ayy, take me to that shit
Nigga, that shit was weak, nigga
Man, shut the fuck up
Nigga, that ain't shit, nigga, ain't nothin' but a couple dollars, nigga, that ain't shit to me, nigga
I said you was leakin'
Ain't even dust in that shit, nigga
Man, I said you was leakin', nigga
Yeah, gimme that shit, nigga, I'm outta here
Fuck nigga
You might also like[Verse 2]
I wake up (Uh), dream and all
Hands behind my head as I stare at the wall
I'm alive (Geah), yeah, it's beautiful, dog
Them niggas tried to put me in a funeral home
Ayy, Young Skee (Yeah), yeah, they ran up in my place
Took a couple hunnid, they ain't even get the safe
(Young boss) I go low for the dope, homie
Y'all niggas couldn't do what I did on parole, homie
(Oh yeah) Pockets stay swole, homie
Straight out the feds, y'all know who told on me
(Pussy ass Benny) Don't try to run up in my villa pad
I keep a chopper on me (Chop), like a helipad

[Chorus]
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Black gloves, black mask with the flashlight
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
Who was that peepin' in my window? (Last night)
They tried to rob me, them niggas tried to rob me

[Outro]
They tried to rob me, them niggas tried to rob meEmbed

song.lyrics:

(Bitch, I'm—bitch, I'm super fly) When I pull up to that light

I'm lookin' down on 'em (Ayy, ayy)
I'm lookin' down on 'em (Ayy, ayy) (Geah)

Who me? I'm just that nigga

If I don't look down, I won't even see you niggas
(Where they at? I don't know) I don't even see you niggas
I'm with a bad bitch fornicatin'
With her two friends, and they participatin'
Yeah (Both ways), that's just the life I live
Young boss of the city, baby, it is what it is

[Chorus: 2 Pistols & BMU]
I got the Chevy sittin' right (Ayy), rims shinin' bright (Ayy)
(Bitch, I'm—bitch, I'm super fly) When I pull up to that light
I'm lookin' down on 'em (Ayy, ayy)
I'm lookin' down on 'em (Ayy, ayy)
(Wet—wet paint drippin') Off the side (Ayy), every time I ride (Ayy)

I'm lookin' down on 'em (Ayy, ayy)
I'm lookin' down on 'em (Ayy, ayy) (Jizzy)

I shoulda been on "I'm So Hood"

song.title: From The Bottom
song.lyrics:
From The Bottom Lyrics[Intro]
Yup, yup, yup
Yup, yup, yup, yup
Yup, yup, yup, yup
Yup, yup

[Chorus]
Look, I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back
Got my head to the sky and the city on my back
Grindin', you know where you can find me
Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me
I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back
Got them Gucci locs fitted in the plastic on my lap
Grindin', you know where you can find me (Geah)
Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me, oh yeah
(Young boss of the city, nigga)
[Verse 1]
Pinellas County born (Born), South Florida raisеd (Raised)
Born in the slums wherе the young ain't safe (Murder city)
Never had a crumb so a thug I became
Started sellin' dope, just to get the new J's (J's)
My momma wasn't there (There), my daddy wasn't either
So I said fuck school, the block was my teacher (Oakwood)
Wasn't good at math but I can break down a half
In a pot, let it rock, and have the block on smash (Yeah)
That was how me and my niggas ate (Ate)
Addicted to the fast cash, we was all flippin' big weight
In and outta state, gettin' cake like we won the lotto
Flyin' birds in the trunk like there's no tomorrow
That's the code that we live by, die by (By)
So now the donk sit high when I ride by (So high)
And BMU the only niggas that I ride for (Geah)
'Til my eyes close, nigga

[Chorus]
Look, I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back
Got my head to the sky and the city on my back
Grindin', you know where you can find me
Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me
I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back
Got them Gucci locs fitted in the plastic on my lap
Grindin', you know where you can find me
Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me, oh yeah
You might also like[Verse 2]
Money, it's one hell of a motivation (Motivations)
But it could put you in some fucked up situations
I learned how to flip that white (Flip that white)
But that white almost got me life (Got me life)
Knock, knock, the feds at the front door (Door)
Half a brick in the toilet tryna flush more (More)
What the fuck I'ma do now (Huh?)
I'm locked up, how the fuck I'ma get out?
On the road to riches and diamond rings
Got a pistol on my lap tryna get this green (Green)
Shit, I'm tryna live that dream (Live that dream)
Stay fly like a nigga grew wings (Grew wings)
I'm so fly in them thousand dollar jeans
D-boy fresh nigga from my head to my feet (Young boss)
And I'ma tell ya like Pat told me (What's that?)
Cash rule everything around 2P

[Chorus]
Look, I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back
Got my head to the sky and the city on my back
Grindin', you know where you can find me
Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me
I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back
Got them Gucci locs fitted in the plastic on my lap
Grindin', you know where you can find me (Geah)
Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me, oh yeah
[Outro]
You see I'm the last one left, right?
Nigga, **** got knocked off
****, they got knocked off
**** got knocked off
**** got knocked off
**** got knocked off
All my niggas got knocked off, right? I'm the last nigga left
They tell you what I do, right? I go holla at a solid nigga
I get me a couple solid, solid blocks, haha, go lock shit down
Murk city, I hold the muh'fuckin' city down, nigga
The whole muh'fuckin' Bay, nigga, I put the city on my back, nigga
A lotta y'all niggas wouldn't be eatin' if it wasn't for me, know what I'm sayin'?
Niggas ain't know they work was comin' from me
(Look, I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back)
I would sell work this nigga, you know what I'm sayin'?
(Got my head to the sky and the city on my back)
And this other nigga is really buyin' the work from this nigga
(Grindin', you know where you can find me)
And this nigga over here is talkin' 'bout, "I don't like that nigga, 2P, fuck that nigga, this, that, and the other nigga," but
(Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me)
I'm the bringin' the work to your nigga for you to eat, nigga
(I came from the bottom of the bottom, I ain't never goin' back)
Fuck you man? I am that nigga, you know what I'm talkin' 'bout?
(Got them Gucci locs fitted in the plastic on my lap)
You slippin'
(Grindin', you know where you can find me)
I would say names, but I ain't gon' say too much, you dig? Haha
(Dead presidents, homie, cash rule everything around me, oh yeah)
Just know that I am really the young boss of the city, man
Real talk, you know and I know now, what it really is, geah
Fuck with your nigga, manEmbed
